DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy two different corticosteroid ointment application regimens treatment eczema ( atopic dermatitis ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Efficacy Two Topical Steroid Application Regimens Pediatric Patients With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Meet clinical criterion diagnosis atopic dermatitis Have disease least 5 % total body surface area . Less 18 year age . Families able comprehend write instruction English able complete questionnaire assistance need . Parents/guardians able understand willing sign parental permission form . Children age 717 year willing sign ageappropriate assent form . Patients allergic intolerant topical medication employ study . Lack followup initial visit regimen noncompliance . Patients access bathtub .
